Name: Roll For Initiative
About the game: Roll for Initiative in an Introductory to Tabletop RPG in a video game. It is a video game to introduce the player to RPG mechanics, exploration, combat, and class distinctions of tabletop reminiscent of Dungeons and Dragons or Pathfinder. It is daunting - the infinite amount of information and rules to play Dungeons and Dragons or Pathfinder. In this game, the rules and material are built-in to teach the player as they advance each level. Dice, characters, enemies, and bosses are all included in the game. The look and feel is tabletop. The dice fall from the top for each move and give accurate damage totals. Immersive Role Player game. Grab a seat at the table.
